game.name: Cute Cats
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 귀여운 고양이들이 당신과 놀고 싶어합니다! 자유 시간을 즐기고 털복숭이 친구들을 행복하게 만드세요! 두 개의 비슷한 수제 그림의 차이점을 찾아보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cute cats want to play with you! Chill out with them in your free time! Find differences between two nearly similar artistic paintings.

reviewHighlights.text: Nice puzzle game EZ to get all achievements 100%
